name: Dragonair
description: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Defense.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
